attributes.action: reduce/stop benefits to those who have drug addictions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I don't want my tax money supporting drug addiction.

Low income families should not be supported by government money if they suffer from addiction, including addiction to legal and regulated products or services.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
